contactSection.title: Want to contact us?
contactSection.text: If you have questions, need legal advice, or want to discuss your case — fill out the form, and we will contact you shortly.

practiceArea.legalText: We won’t stop until we win! We prepare your case, defend your interests, and speak the language of the law.
practiceArea.personalInjuryText: «Your health is our priority.» We provide legal assistance in cases of compensation for harm caused by injuries, accidents, or incidents.
practiceArea.businessSetupText: «Start your business without headaches!» We select the optimal legal form, prepare documents, and open the company
practiceArea.contractsText: «So your word carries weight.» We draft contracts that protect your interests
practiceArea.tendersText: We help organize events, conferences, and forums at the highest level — from legal support to full organizational management.
practiceArea.insuranceText: «You build — we insure the risks.» Subscription support allows you to avoid hiring an in-house lawyer and get a team of experts immediately

aboutSection.title: About us
aboutSection.companyName: Senat Consulting — a legal and consulting company
aboutSection.companyDescription: uniting experienced lawyers and project organization specialists. We carefully study each case, develop a strategy, and bring the matter to a result — from negotiations and document preparation to court decisions.
aboutSection.workingPrinciple: We work on a pay-for-results principle: no prepayments or hidden fees. Our specialists deeply understand legal processes, including participation in the preparation and analysis of regulatory acts, which allows us to find optimal solutions for clients.

portfolio.title: Our recent cases
portfolio.case6Title: We’ll help organize your event and provide top-level legal support.
